author: Barbara Ortutay, Dee-ann Durbin
title: Virus outbreak delivers tech darlings a harsh reality check - The Associated Press
description: Just as the coronavirus outbreak has boxed in society, it’s also squeezed high-flying tech companies reliant on people’s freedom to move around and get together. Since the beginning of...
content:
Just as the coronavirus outbreak has boxed in society, its also squeezed high-flying tech companies reliant on peoples freedom to move around and get together.
Since the beginning of March, for instance, Uber shares have lost a quarter of their value. Rival … [+4476 chars]
